trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Amarillo
There was one other sighting in Amarillo on or around March 17th 2010
divs: sighting detailswhile walking the dog early in the morning i noticed two lights in the sky. at first i thought it was an airliner, but then one light dimed and then one light grew very big, about 1\2 to 2\3 the size of the full moon. the light then dimed down and then the two small points of light move away to the northwest. the light grew big like a flare two times. the whole event lasted about 5 mintes. the two large flares lasted about 45 seconds, with about 3-4 seconds at maximum. the lights appeared to be above the atmosphere and possibly as high as 500 miles.
